title: Game Scoop Episode 569
description: This week we reached out to a bunch of developers to get their take on what Xbox Series X's specs will make possible in next-gen games. We also talk about Ghost of Tsushima and Zelda: Breath of the Wild 2.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
content:encoded: This week we reached out to a bunch of developers to get their take on what Xbox Series X's specs will make possible in next-gen games. We also talk about Ghost of Tsushima and Zelda: Breath of the Wild 2.
